name: Reset 1-1
description: The world has ended, Demons have risen to conquer the uninhabited and flourishing nature outside.  It's your turn, with your unknown identity, to find your path for a new beginning.  Let's not beat about the bush here. Reset 1-1 is everything you loved about the late 80's/early 90's. It's a blast from the past, with a fresh spin.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 30 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is one of the worst looking games I've ever seen, yet it performs wose than a AAA title.
